pr_title: Fix missing nested streams due to column name mismatch

timeline.message:
Fix missing nested streams due to column name mismatch

In StripeReader we read only required nested streams
by matching the requested nested field name to the name persisted.
When written by other compute engines the name persisted can be
uppercase which causes mismatch. Case conversion of persisted name fixes this.
